description: Work under this requirement comprises the furnishing of all labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision required to perform operational and emergency repairs to the chiller units located at various areas of CFB Halifax.

full_summary:
# W684H-240232: Chiller Unit Repair - CFB Halifax
## Government of Canada Tender Announcement

### Overview

This tender announcement provides information for the repair of chiller units located at the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax. The repair work will be carried out by a selected contractor under a standing offer contract.

### Contract Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS4591109326-Doc4596899492
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4591109326
* **Publication Date:** June 14, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 11, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Tender Status:** Exired

### Classification and Procurement Information

* **UNSPSC Classification:** Industrial refrigerators
* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This tender is covered under various trade agreements, including:
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Industry and Delivery Information

* **Industrial Classification:** Industrial refrigerators
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Nova Scotia, Halifax

### Purchaser Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Leonard, Dylon (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: dylon.leonard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
